hehehe Frank
   
  There are many ways to investigate the "unknown" and many paths one can take to do it. You are right, you should be more tolerant.. and so should others. We all have one thing in common no matter what we believe.. we all want to know MORE.
   
  You may be cranky sometimes but I'd never call you dense =)~
   
  Misty

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          I was watching a thing on History about the various UFO Hunters, and how 
they go about digging for the evidence, and the various "jobs" each does. It 
occured to me that I ghost hunter was exactly the same, and I should be alot 
more tolerant of theses other elevel of investigation. Anyone that has known 
me for awhile probably knows I can be dense!

Frank
